item_name.title: Item Name
item_name.description: Provide a name for the item including brand, color, fit and size, if available.
examples: Tommy Bahama 'Shades of Paradise' Polo Large Blue

value.title: Item Name
value.description: Provide a name for the item including brand, color, fit and size, if available.
examples: Robert Graham Men's Maya Bay Short Sleeve Classic Fit Shirt, Cranberry, X-Large

brand.title: Brand Name
brand.description: An alphanumeric string; 1 character minimum in length and 50 characters maximum in length.

value.title: Brand Name
value.description: Provide the brand name of the product
examples: Calvin Klein, Hanes, Goodthreads, Under Armour

externally_assigned_product_identifier.title: External Product ID
externally_assigned_product_identifier.description: Provide the external ID (barcode) type and corresponding value that is being used to identify the product

type.title: External Product ID Type
type.description: Select the type of external ID (barcode) that is being used to identify this product

value.title: External Product ID
value.description: Provide the corresponding external product id value based on the type that was selected

item_type_keyword.title: Category (item-type)
item_type_keyword.description: What is the item that you are selling?

value.title: Item Type Keyword
value.description: Item type keywords are used to place new ASINs in the appropriate place(s) within the graph. Select the most specific accurate term for optimal placement.

collar_style.title: collar-type
collar_style.description: Provide the style of collar used by the item. The collar style is determined by overall shape, design, and form of an item's collar.

value.title: Collar Style
value.description: Provide the style of collar used by the item. The collar style is determined by overall shape, design, and form of an item's collar.

age_gender_category.title: Age Gender Category
age_gender_category.description: Specify the department where the product should be found

value.title: Age Gender Category
value.description: Specify the department where the product should be found

list_price.title: List Price
list_price.description: Provide the list price for the product. List Price is the suggested retail price of a product as provided by a manufacturer, supplier, or seller. This is not the offering or cost price.

value.title: List Price
value.description: Provide the list price for the product not including tax. List Price is the suggested retail price of a product as provided by a manufacturer, supplier, or seller. This is not the offering or cost price. If you are unable to provide a value, enter 0.

main_offer_image_locator.title: Main Offer Image Locator
main_offer_image_locator.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Main Image Location
media_location.description: The URL where the main offer-specific image of the product is located

other_offer_image_locator_1.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_1.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_offer_image_locator_2.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_2.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_offer_image_locator_3.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_3.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_offer_image_locator_4.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_4.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_offer_image_locator_5.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_5.description: Provide the location and source of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

import_designation.title: Import Designation
import_designation.description: Provide the country where the shirt was manufactured, indicating its origin for import purposes.
examples: Made in USA, Made in USA or Imported

value.title: Import Designation
value.description: Provide the country of origin to assist in import classification and duties for the item.

enum: Made in the USA and Imported
Made in the USA or Imported
enumNames: Made in the USA and Imported
Made in the USA or Imported

product_description.title: Product Description
product_description.description: A text string; 2000 characters maximum in length. Note: Type 1 High ASCII characters (®, ©, ™, etc.) or other special characters are not supported.
examples: Long sleeve v-neck cardigan with a ribbed waistline and pockets with bow detailing

value.title: Product Description
value.description: Provide a text description of the product. This information will appear in paragraph form on the detail page of your product. Include unique product features, product line details, and product specifications. Do not use all caps.
examples: This summer, boots by Jette made from high quality suede leather are real gems. They visually highlight the craftsmanship and fine leather braid positioned at the top of the shaft

bullet_point.title: Bullet Point
bullet_point.description: An alphanumeric string; 100 characters maximum length per bullet point. Please do not include an actual bullet point object, just the text used to describe your product. Note: Type 1 High ASCII characters (®, ©, ™, etc.) or other special characters are not supported.

value.title: Bullet Point
value.description: Brief descriptive text, called out via a bullet point, regarding a specific aspect of the product. These display directly under or next to your product photo, it is useful to put interesting information in these fields. Do NOT use all caps or abbreviations. Please do NOT use for fabric content, care instructions or country as these are populated in different fields.

generic_keyword.title: Search Terms
generic_keyword.description: An alphanumeric string; 1 character minimum in length and 50 characters maximum in length.

value.title: Generic Keywords
value.description: Provide any terms that may be relevant to customer searches. No repetition, no competitor brand names or ASINs.
examples: Casual shirt; Button down; Relaxed fit; Men's shirt

special_feature.title: Additional Features
special_feature.description: Select a value from the Valid Values dropdown
examples: max number of images 36,  Operating Time 6 hours

value.title: Special Features
value.description: Provide any special features an item has that distinguish it from other, comparable products

lifestyle.title: Apparel Occasion and Lifestyle
lifestyle.description: Provide the lifestyle or activity the item is designed for, such as casual wear, athletic wear, or formal occasions.

value.title: Lifestyle
value.description: Provide the level of formality the shirt is designed for, indicating its appropriateness for different social or organizational settings.

style.title: Style Name
style.description: Select a value from the Valid Values dropdown

value.title: Style
value.description: Provide the style of the product. Style refers to the aesthetic choices of a person or a group of people. It describes the distinctive visual representation of a product

department.title: Department
department.description: Select a value from the Valid Values dropdown

value.title: Department Name
value.description: Provide the intended gender or age group for which the apparel item is designed, indicating the target demographic.

target_gender.title: Target Gender
target_gender.description: Provide the target gender for the product

value.title: Target Gender
value.description: Provide the target gender for the product

shirt_size.title: Shirt Size
shirt_size.description: Provide the sizing information for the shirt.
examples:
size_system:app_size_system_1,
body_type:regular,
height_type: regular,
size_class:numeric,
size:6,
size_to:7,
neck_size:16,
neck_size_to:16.5
sleeve_length: 30,
sleeve_length_to:32

size_system.title: Shirt Size System
size_system.description: Provide the size system for the shirt.

size_class.title: Shirt Size Class
size_class.description: Provide the size class for the shirt.

size.title: Shirt Size Value
size.description: Provide the size value associated with the size system and size class.

size_to.title: Shirt Size To Range
size_to.description: Provide the to size value (if range), must be greater than the size value.

neck_size.title: Neck Size Value
neck_size.description: Provide the neck size for the shirt.

neck_size_to.title: Neck Size To Value
neck_size_to.description: Provide the to neck size value (if range), must be greater than the neck size value.

sleeve_length.title: Sleeve Length Value
sleeve_length.description: Provide the sleeve length for the shirt.

sleeve_length_to.title: Sleeve Length To Value
sleeve_length_to.description: Provide the to sleeve length value (if range), must be greater than the sleeve length value.

body_type.title: Shirt Body Type
body_type.description: Provide the body type for apparel item, select "Regular" in case of no special body type.

height_type.title: Shirt Height Type
height_type.description: Provide the height type for apparel item, select "Regular" in case of no special height type.

material.title: Material Type
material.description: What material is the product made out of?

value.title: Material
value.description: Specify the primary materials used for manufacturing the item

fabric_type.title: Fabric Type
fabric_type.description: Provide the materials used to make the item, including their percentages, like cotton, rayon, etc.

value.title: Fabric Type
value.description: Provide the materials used to make the shirt, listing all fabrics with their percentage composition.

subject_character.title: character
subject_character.description: Provide the character, person, or figure depicted on the item, representing the main subject or theme.

value.title: Subject Character
value.description: Provide the character portrayed on the shirt, indicating the fictional or real person represented in the design or print.

special_size_type.title: Special Size Type
special_size_type.description: Select a value from the Valid Values dropdown

value.title: Special Size
value.description: Provide the special size category for the clothing item, indicating non-standard sizing options for specific body types or age groups.

color.title: Color
color.description: Provide the color of the product

standardized_values.title: Color Map
standardized_values.description: Select the most dominant color of the product.

value.title: Color
value.description: Provide the color of the product

occasion_type.title: Occasion Type
occasion_type.description: Provide the type of event or setting the item is designed for, such as formal, casual, or athletic wear.

value.title: Occasion
value.description: Provide the holiday or major life event that the clothing item is designed for, such as cultural, national, or religious celebrations.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Provide the primary high-level concept, motif, or idea that the item itself, or else the images or design of the item, evoke.

value.title: Theme
value.description: Provide the primary high-level concept, motif, or idea that the item itself, or else the images or design of the item, evoke.

fit_type.title: Fit Type
fit_type.description: Provide the style of how the shirt is designed to fit on the body, such as loose or snug.

value.title: Fit Type
value.description: Provide the style of how the shirt is designed to fit on the body, such as loose or snug.

care_instructions.title: Product Care Instructions
care_instructions.description: Provide instructions related to how to care for the item

value.title: Care Instructions
value.description: Provide instructions related to how to care for the item

design_name.title: Design Name
design_name.description: Select a value that best describes the design on the product

value.title: Design Name
value.description: Select a value that best describes the design on the product

pre_printed_text.title: Pre Printed Text
pre_printed_text.description: The attribute indicates the Pre Printed Text of the product

value.title: Pre Printed Text
value.description: The attribute indicates the Pre Printed Text of the product

occasion.title: Occasion
occasion.description: Indicate the occasion of use for the product

value.title: Occasion
value.description: Indicate the occasion of use for the product

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: Provide the most prominent repeated decorative design of the item

value.title: Pattern
value.description: Provide the most prominent repeated decorative design of the item

embellishment_feature.title: Embellishment Feature
embellishment_feature.description: Provide the decorative elements or designs added to the item, such as prints, patterns, or embroidery.

value.title: Embellishment Feature
value.description: Provide the decorative element attached to the shirt, such as additional style details or ornamentation.

neck.title: Neck
neck.description: The attribute indicates Neck of the product

neck_style.title: Neck Style
neck_style.description: Select a value from the Valid Values dropdown

value.title: Neck Style
value.description: Provide the neck style of the product

shirt_form_type.title: Shirt Form Type
shirt_form_type.description: Provide the form type of the shirt. The form classifies shirts based on shared characteristics and shape.

value.title: Shirt Form Type
value.description: Provide the form type of the shirt. The form classifies shirts based on shared characteristics and shape.

sleeve.title: Sleeve
sleeve.description: The attribute indicates the Sleeve of the product

cuff_style.title: Cuff Type
cuff_style.description: Select a value from the Valid Values dropdown

value.title: Sleeve Cuff Style
value.description: Provide the item's sleeve cuff style

type.title: Sleeve Type
type.description: Provide the style of sleeves on the item, the part covering the arms, like short, long, or sleeveless.

value.title: Sleeve Type
value.description: Provide the item's type of sleeve

hemline_form.title: Hemline Form
hemline_form.description: Provide the hemline form of the garment.  The hemline is the line at the bottom edge of an apparel garment.

value.title: Hemline Form
value.description: Provide the hemline form of the garment.  The hemline is the line at the bottom edge of an apparel garment.

parentage_level.title: Parentage Level
parentage_level.description: Specify whether a SKU is a parent or child

value.title: Parentage Level
value.description: Specify whether a SKU is a parent or child

child_parent_sku_relationship.title: Child Parent Sku Relationship
child_parent_sku_relationship.description: The attribute indicates the Child Parent Sku Relationship of the product

child_relationship_type.title: Child Relationship Type
child_relationship_type.description: The relationship that the child has to the parent

parent_sku.title: Parent SKU
parent_sku.description: The SKU of the parent item

variation_theme.title: Variation Theme
variation_theme.description: Specify the variation theme that the product will use. The theme's attributes must be populated for all items in the grouping.

name.title: Variation Theme Name
name.description: Specify the variation theme that the product will use. The theme's attributes must be populated for all items in the grouping.

country_of_origin.title: Country of Publication
country_of_origin.description: The country in which the product was published.

value.title: Country of Origin
value.description: Select the product's country of origin
enumNames: Heard Island and the McDonald Islands
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
The Democratic Republic of the Congo

california_proposition_65.title: California Proposition 65
california_proposition_65.description: Provide the Proposition 65 warning information applicable to your product, if any. By removing or changing the information you certify that the previously provided warning information is no longer legally required

compliance_type.title: California Proposition 65 Warning Type
compliance_type.description: Select the warning type applicable to your product, if any. You certify that the warning provided satisfies legal requirements and that you’ll remove a warning previously provided only if it is no longer legally required.

chemical_names.title: California Proposition 65 Chemical Name(s)
chemical_names.description: If you selected the Food, Furniture, or Chemical warning you must indicate a chemical(s). You certify that the chemical(s) satisfies legal requirements and that you’ll remove a chemical previously provided only if it is no longer legally required.

enumNames: 2,4-Hexadienal (89% trans, trans isomer; 11% cis, trans isomer)
Alcoholic beverages, when associated with alcohol abuse
Aloe Vera, non-decolorized whole leaf extract
Bitumens, extracts of steam-refined and air refined
Carbon black (airborne, unbound particles of respirable size)
Ceramic fibers (airborne particles of respirable size)
Chlorinated paraffins (Average chain length, C12;approximately 60 percent chlorine by weight)
Cyanide salts that readily dissociate in solution (expressed as cyanide)f
Emissions from high-temperature unrefined rapeseed oil
Etoposide in combination with cisplatin and bleomycin
Herbal remedies containing plant species of the genus Aristolochia
Hydrogen cyanide (HCN) and cyanide salts (CN salts)
Infant boys, age 29 days to 24 monthsb
Methyl bromide, as a structural fumigant
Neonatal infant boys, age 0 to 28 daysb
Nickel refinery dust from the pyrometallurgical process
Pentachlorophenol and by-products of its synthesis (complex mixture)
Perfluorooctane sulfonic acid (PFOS) and its salts and transformation and degradation precursors
Polychlorinated biphenyls (containing 60 or more percent chlorine by molecular weight)
Quinoline and its strong acid salts
Retinol/retinyl esters, when in daily dosages in excess of 10,000 IU, or 3,000 retinol equivalents.
Silica, crystalline (airborne particles of respirable size)
Soots, tars, and mineral oils (untreated and mildly treated oils and used engine oils)
Strong inorganic acid mists containing sulfuric acid
Titanium dioxide (airborne, unbound particles of respirable size)
Tobacco, oral use of smokeless products
Toxins derived from Fusarium moniliforme (Fusarium verticillioides)

compliance_printing_method.title: Compliance - Printing method
compliance_printing_method.description: Provide the style used to print a design on the item, for compliance purposes. Batik method is the use of wax on fabric to create designs.

value.title: Compliance - Printing method
value.description: Provide the style used to print a design on the item, for compliance purposes. Batik method is the use of wax on fabric to create designs.

compliance_age_range.title: Compliance - Age Range
compliance_age_range.description: Provide the age group the item is intended for use, for compliance purposes. Baby/Infant is defined as a body height not exceeding 86 cm.

value.title: Compliance - Age Range
value.description: Provide the age group the item is intended for use, for compliance purposes. Baby/Infant is defined as a body height not exceeding 86 cm.

compliance_t_shirt_design.title: Compliance - T-Shirt Design
compliance_t_shirt_design.description: Provide the item's design, for compliance purposes.

value.title: Compliance - T-Shirt Design
value.description: Provide the item's design, for compliance purposes.

compliance_shirt_type.title: Compliance - Shirt Type
compliance_shirt_type.description: Provide the intended occasion or use for the item, for compliance purposes.

value.title: Compliance - Shirt Type
value.description: Provide the intended occasion or use for the item, for compliance purposes.

compliance_collar_type.title: Compliance - Collar Type
compliance_collar_type.description: Provide the type of collar used on the item, for compliance purposes.

value.title: Compliance - Collar Type
value.description: Provide the type of collar used on the item, for compliance purposes.
